description.value:
Usage drawn on armor

This rune insulates from harmful energy of all kinds. The creature wearing the armor gains resistance 5 to your choice of cold, electricity, or fire, and any creature that touches them or damages them with an unarmed attack or non-reach melee weapon takes 2d6 damage. The rune has the trait of the energy type chosen and deals damage of that type.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e-playtest-data.impossible-playtest-effects.Item.aa9Ncmtrwm1EThms]{Effect: Kojastri, Rune of Insulation}

Invocation Any creature that has the armor's wearer engulfed, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained}, or swallowed whole takes @Damage[(4 + 2*floor((@actor.level - 9) / 4))d6[untyped]] damage with a @Check[reflex|against:class|basic] save against your class DC. On a failure, it also releases the armor's wearer.

Level (+4) The resistance increases by 5, and the damage increases by 1d6, or 2d6 for the invocation.
